verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w be|strong="H1732"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* people trample \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day righting \w and|strong="H1732"\w* pressing \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* enemies \w trample|strong="H7602"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*; many \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* contend \w with|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w* bitterly.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* terror \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God \w I|strong="H3117"\w* maintain \w my|strong="H3372"\w* cause, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* God \w I|strong="H3117"\w* fearlessly trust. \w What|strong="H3372"\w* can flesh do \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3372"\w*?

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* torture \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* day, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* ceaselessly \w plan|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w hurt|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*,

banded \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* secret, watching \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* step, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* death.

\w Pay|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* out \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* sin, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, hurl down \w the|strong="H8104"\w* strong \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* anger.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* count \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wanderings. \w Put|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* bottle \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tears \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* book?

\w Then|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* foes \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* back \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* call. \w Of|strong="H5612"\w* \w this|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* am sure, because \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5612"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God \w I|strong="H3588"\w* maintain \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* maintain \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w*.
\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* fearlessly trust, \w what|strong="H1697"\w* can people \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w Your|strong="H6213"\w* vows \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* render thank-offerings \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*;

\w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* saved \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H5921"\w* stumbling, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w end|strong="H7999"\w* \w that|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* walk \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* living.
